summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5816 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 18, Bell and Denny's 2nd Addition, being the alley between 2nd Avenue and 3rd Avenue, from Cedar Street to Clay Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 76647, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
